## PluginConfigDescriptor.deprecations property

Provider for the [ConfigDeprecation](./kibana-plugin-server.configdeprecation.md) to apply to the plugin configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
deprecations?: ConfigDeprecationProvider;
```
